lines.text: Where am I? It sure is powerful warm in here. Is this Dallas?
'Knighty Knight Bugs' was directed by Friz Freleng. He got an Oscar and I got a carrot.

Any one of you lily livered, bow legged varmints care to slap leather with me? In case any of ya get any idears, ya better know yer dealin' with. I'm the hootiness, tootiness, shootiness, bob tailed wildcat in the west.
[Fires his guns at the ground as they lift him in the air]
I'm the fastest gun north, south, east, aaaaaaand west of the Pecos. I'm the...
[Porky has been beaten by gangsters who are after Tweety]
You talked me in to it.
[Daffy is rescued after being forced to lay golden eggs]
Is there anything we can get for you, old chap?
Yes. Get me a proctologist, right away.
Ah, this is Hollywood, city of winners. Winners of Oscars, Emmys and Grammys.
